notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Zomwe mukuchita zidzasinthidwa kukhala zosadziwika mu masiku 7 chifukwa
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Zonse zomwe mukuchita m'gulu lino zidzasinthidwa kukhala zosadziwika ndikusungidwa mu masiku 7, pambuyo pake simudzatha kuzichotsa kapena kuzisintha. Onani zomwe mukuchita pansipa.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Zonse zomwe mukuchita m'gulu lino zidzasinthidwa kukhala zosadziwika ndikusungidwa mu masiku 7, pambuyo pake simudzatha kuzichotsa kapena kuzisintha. Onani zomwe mukuchita pansipa.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Dinani pa ulalo wa m'chipatala pansipa, lowani ngati admin ndikusankha Fraud management kuchokera pa menyu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Chiwerengero cha zochitika zomwe zingakhale zachinyengo ndi mwayi wa 75% wa chinyengo
email.possibleFraudInformation: Dongosolo lathu lokha lakhala likuzindikira zochitika zomwe zingakhale zachinyengo. Mutha kuwona mosamala kudzera pa Community admin interface. Zina mwa zochitikazi zingakhale ndi zifukwa zosachinyengo choncho samalani musanachotse zomwe zili.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Zomwezi zakhala zikulembedwa zokha ngati zopweteka pogwiritsa ntchito ma algorithms a AI omwe amayesa kuopsa kwa zomwe zili. Mutha kuchotsa zomwe zili ngati kuli kofunikira.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Algorithm ya AI mwachangu yakhala ikulemba zithunzi zolumikizidwa ndi zomwezi. Algorithm iyi imayang'ana zithunzi pazinthu zomwe zingakhale za akuluakulu, zachiwawa, zachipatala, ndi zithunzi zosangalatsa. Mutha kuchotsa zomwe zili ngati kuli kofunikira.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Nthawi zina algorithm ya AI imawerengera zolakwika, m'menemo musadandaule, simukuyenera kuchita chilichonse ndipo mutha kunyalanyaza imelo iyi.
email.automaticToxicityHowLikely: Kodi ndi kuchuluka kotani (%) kukhala koopsa
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: Mfundo yatsopano yawonjezedwa pa lingaliro lanu
email.user_invite_2: Dinani pa ulalo kapena muiike mu bar ya adilesi ya msakatuli kuti muvomereze kuitanidwa
email.reset_password_1: Nayi ulalo wosinthira mawu anu achinsinsi.
email.reset_password_2: Ngati simunapemphe izi, chonde ignoreni imelo iyi.
email.reset_password_3: Mawu anu achinsinsi sadzasinthidwa mpaka mutalowa pa link pamwambapa ndikupanga yatsopano.
